titles.title: Condemning Turkey's attacks on United States forces and allies and Turkey's continued support for terrorist organizations.
Condemning Turkey's attacks on United States forces and allies and Turkey's continued support for terrorist organizations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Europe, Eurasia, Energy and the Environment.

bill.summary: This resolution condemns Turkey's attacks on U.S. forces and allies and demands the end of Turkey's support of terrorist groups. The resolution also calls on the President to work with the North Atlantic Treaty Organization (NATO) to remove Turkey from NATO.
